summary: "Thor: The Dark World" is a 2013 superhero movie about the Marvel Comics character Thor. It's the eighth film in the Marvel Cinematic Universe and a sequel to the 2011 "Thor". Thor and his brother Loki team up to save the Nine Realms from the Dark Elves. The film was directed by Alan Taylor and stars Chris Hemsworth as Thor and Tom Hiddleston as Loki. It was a commercial success but got mixed reviews. Taylor later said Marvel changed his vision during post-production. Two more sequels have followed.
title: Thor The Dark World
